item.title: Sales Tax Information is being loaded.
item.description:
In a recent project, I needed to create Tax Schedules in Dynamics GP using a spreadsheet containing customer data, zip codes, and their respective city, state, and local tax rates. I developed a series of scripts to import this data from Excel and wanted to share them to potentially benefit others. In this scenario, the tax details were already in Dynamics GP, and the spreadsheet used their corresponding Tax Detail IDs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sales-tax-information-is-being-loaded/
